name: Escape Games Blythe Castle - Point & Click Mystery
name_original: Escape Games Blythe Castle - Point & Click Mystery
description:
Do you love escape games, mystery adventure games, and point & click puzzle games? Then you will love Escape Games Blythe Castle!

Escape Blythe Castle is a level based, adventure & puzzle escape game. Each room has a story to tell, and there are many tricky puzzles to solve.

The story begins in modern day Europe on Castle grounds. The Princess gets wind of distressing news regarding the King's sudden disappearance. The Kingdom has suddenly fallen under attack!

Without haste, you are instructed by Queen Beatrice to flee to the Castle's long kept secret rooms & embark on a dangerous quest to solve the puzzles within, and escape each room ... No one has ever set foot in this part of the Castle... you are the brave & privileged first visitor.

The only way you can save the Kingdom is to gain access to a priceless family heirloom, buried deep within the Castle.

Dark & foreboding rooms await, difficult puzzles & challenges lie ahead, & only the bravest, the fiercest, and the smartest will be able to solve all the rooms...

Do you have what it takes, to Escape the Rooms & save Blythe Castle?

We dare you to enter the trenches of Escape Games Blythe Castle...

Features Include:

Vivid Graphics & Stunning Scenery - Blythe Castle comes to life on screen with gorgeous rooms, scenery, and puzzles!

Intricate & Tricky Puzzles: Level based escape game with varying puzzles & cryptic note solutions.

Very detailed storyline that will immerse you from beginning to end & another shocking twist ending will be unveiled.

Theatrical Music Tracks - Cinema quality music & sound effects will bring this game to life, and immerse you into the world of Blythe Castle! Custom designed music for every scene, & every mood.
